trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There was one other sighting in McKinney on or around May 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife had just walked outside the front door to lock the pickup. When she saw a green fireball fall straight down from the sky to the south of her. She said that it was large and very bright and appeared to hit the ground. No sound was heard. The sky was clear. The city light were bright but the green firball was very bright. I heard her make a loud exclamation, and ran down the stairs to see what was wrong. She had a reacition of awe.
Summary: Green fireball comming straight down due south of our house.
